attributes.review: When I opened the app, I saw a stale Cheeto. It was really scary. I lost my appetite even though I was I hadn’t eaten in 30 hours. It was all spam from a racist, misogynistic, homophobic man trying to spread hate. Will NEVER download again. I’ve learned my lesson.
attributes.title: HORRIFYINGLY BAD
